name: Moonshiners Simulator
description:
When crafting new recipes, don’t be afraid to experiment, it may turn out that your creation will give birth to the best moonshine in the world.Act in the underground
Creating moonshine is illegal, do your best to hide your production undercover. Expand very carefully not to arouse suspicion. Buy more equipment, hire more people. Craft more liquor.Watch out for your competitor
Your competitors are waiting for your mistakes, they will try to make your life miserable, they want to eliminate you from the business using various devious tricks, so be prepared. Remember that with huge popularity of your home-brewing the police will start to sniff around, stay alert. Don’t get caught. Hide, create deception. Avoid publicity.Key Features:
  • Repair your installation
  • Create new recipes
  • Expand your production lines
  • Prepare your own moonshine
  • Fight with cops and competition
